title: Listener Mail: UN Abuse Scandal, Mushrooms as Medicine, Getting Kidnapped by the CIA
itunes:title: Listener Mail: UN Abuse Scandal, Mushrooms as Medicine, Getting Kidnapped by the CIA
description:
An anonymous caller asks for more details on the infamous UN and Oxfam sexual abuse scandal. A listener describes their transformative experience using psychedelics as medicine. Another caller shares an Orwellian story of being kidnapped to work for the CIA. All this and more in this week's listener mail.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

They don't want you to read our book.: https://static.macmillan.com/static/fib/stuff-you-should-read/

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
